item.title: PC by Post
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:13, topic:273771”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=361791.msg2756537#msg2756537 date=1240248449]

*A maximum of 3 responses per month.

That would be awesome if there was a “webclient” for crysis, where a master server had the game running and you could control it through firefox.

You can already do that with linux games (and therefore any game that runs with wine, I suppose) because they run on the X server, which you can use from another computer. (IE, I ‘ssh -Y server.hostname’ and then run any program you want, firefox for example, the program runs on whatever computer you are connected to, but the GUI shows up and is controlled on your computer)
[/quote]
I read somewhere that SSH was not intended for anything other than commandline.[/quote]

Whoever wrote that was an idiot, it was meant for many other things.

Read full topic
